articles.title: Prince Charles arrives at hospital to visit his father Philip - 7NEWS.com.au
articles.description: The Prince of Wales has visited the hospital where his father Prince Philip has been staying after feeling unwell.
articles.content:
Prince Charles has visited his father Prince Philip in hospital in London.
